details.judgement: The predicted edit type 'punctuation' matches exactly with the ground truth edit type ('punctuation'). The original text ('Sun and Shadow') and the corrected text ('Sun and Shadow.') also match explicitly, capturing precisely the punctuation insertion intended by the ground truth edit. While the predicted edit references 'Chapter 1' instead of '007.png', the instructions specify only to evaluate edit type and text accuracy, explicitly ignoring line numbers and implicitly disregarding page labels that do not affect the actual edit content. Thus, the core change (addition of a period at the end of 'Sun and Shadow') is correctly captured by the prediction.
